title: K-Lite Mega Codec Pack 1.48
description:
K-Lite Codec Pack is a collection of codecs and related tools. Codec is short for Compressor-Decompressor. Codecs are needed for encoding and decoding (playing) audio and video. The K-Lite Codec Pack is designed as a user-friendly solution for playing all your movie files. With the K-Lite Codec Pack you should be able to play all the popular movie formats and even some rare formats.

The K-Lite Mega Codec Pack combines the contents of three codec packs:

* K-Lite Codec Pack Full
* QuickTime Alternative
* Real Alternative


Features of version 1.48:

Players:

* BSplayer [version 1.36.825]
* Media Player Classic [version 6.4.8.7]

ffdshow:

* ffdshow [build 2005-12-22]
* extra plugins
* ffdshow VFW interface

DirectShow video filters:

* XviD [version 1.1.0]
* DivX Pro [version 5.2.1]
* 3ivX Pro [version D4 4.5.1]
* CoreAVC [version 0.0.0.4] 
* On2 VP6 [version 6.4.2.0]
* On2 VP7 [version 7.0.9.0]
* Cyberlink DVD decoder [version 6.0.0.1417]
* MPEG-2 (Ligos) [version 4.0.0.77]
* MPEG-2 (Cyberlink) [version 6.0.0.1402]
* MPEG-2 (MainConcept) [version 1.0.0.56]

Changelog 1.47 -> 1.48:

- Updated CoreAVC to version 0.0.0.4
- Updated QuickTime Alternative to version 1.68
- Updated Haali Media Splitter to build 2006-01-15
- Indeo, I.263 and WMV9VCM will now also be uninstalled. Only those parts that are installed by this pack will be removed. Parts that already existed will not be touched by the (un)installer.
- Minor changes and improvements
